data.title: University of Delaware Athletics
data.meta_description: Alex Villas (3) Defensive Back - CAREER ACCOLADES Three-time member of the CAA Football Commissioner's Academic Honor Roll 2023 CSC Academic All-District Tea...
data.text:
CAREER ACCOLADES

Three-time member of the CAA Football Commissioner's Academic Honor Roll

2023 CSC Academic All-District Team

2020-21 PFL Academic Honor Roll

2023 SEASON

Appeared in 13 games, making 10 starts

Finished with 33 tackles, 2.0 TFLs, a forced fumble and four PBUs

Had three PBUs in season opener at Stony Brook (8/31)

Had five tackles, 1.0 TFLs, and a PBU against UNH (9/23)

Recorded five tackles and a QBH against NC A&T (10/14)

Earned High Honors on the Fall CAA Football Commissioner's Academic Honor Roll

CSC Academic All-District Team

2022 SEASON

Appeared in ten games

Had five tackles

Selected to the 2022 Fall and 2023 Spring CAA Commissioner's Academic Honor Roll

2021 (at Stetson)

Appeared in nine games as a redshirt freshman

Ranked seventh on the defense with 33 total tackles and tied for second with two interceptions

Also added three pass breakups and a forced fumble

Was a force in the backfield, recording 6.0 TFL, 1.5 sacks and one quarterback hurry

Had a season-high six tackles and 3.0 TFL against Ave Maria

Had interceptions in consecutive games against Presbyterian and Dayton

Returned an interception 28 yards for a touchdown against Presbyterian

2020-21 (at Stetson)

Appeared in one game and maintained a redshirt

Selected to the PFL Academic Honor Roll

High School: Attended Highlands Christian Academy in Pompano Beach through his junior season before playing at North Broward Prep as a senior … A two-way player, Villas led North Broward with 946 all-purpose yards including 134 rushing yards, a team-high 334 receiving yards and 478 kickoff return yards … Scored eight total touchdowns … Was credited with 17 total tackles, including 2.0 TFL … Had one fumble recovery with a 24-yard return for a touchdown … Earned South Florida Sun-Sentinel First Team All-County honors … Also played basketball and was on the track & field team at Highlands Christian, earning all-county honors in track as a junior … In the classroom, was an honor student and a member of the National Honor Society.
